scripts.copy:angular: rm -rf node/src/public && mkdir -p node/src/public && cp -R angular/dist/angular/browser/* node/src/public/
scripts.prepare:electron:resources: npm run clean:electron:resources && mkdir -p electron/build_resources/node electron/build_resources/ui && cp -R node/src electron/build_resources/node/src && cp node/package.json electron/build_resources/node/package.json && (test -f node/package-lock.json && cp node/package-lock.json electron/build_resources/node/package-lock.json || true) && (cd electron/build_resources/node && npm install --omit=dev) && cp -R angular/dist/angular/browser/* electron/build_resources/ui/
scripts.dist:mac: npm run clean:electron:build && npm run build:angular && npm run prepare:electron:resources && npm --prefix electron run dist && npm run clean:electron:resources
